data.title: 9 The Lust for Glory
data.meta_description: 9 The Lust for Glory was published in Empires of the Sand on page 138.
data.text:
Karsh, Efraim and Karsh, Inari. "9 The Lust for Glory". Empires of the Sand: The Struggle for Mastery in the Middle East, 1789–1923, Cambridge, MA and London, England: Harvard University Press, 2001, pp. 138-149. https://doi.org/10.4159/9780674039346-011
